name: Dino Rampage Off-Road Truck Racing 3D
description:
Watch out for the dinosaurs as you race your way to the finish line. Drive hard, drive fast to beat the competitors. Try and collect all 16 prizes. Super fun off road racing game with 50 Challenging race courses.

Dinosaurs and mister trucks together in the same game, what could be better. From the moment you start the game you will feel the special 3D effects and graphics.

Choose your car from 6 Different options. You begin each race in the rear of the pack and the obstacle is to try and make you way to the front of the pack and race your way to victory.
